title: Stripping Away the Insanity of Life and Parenthood!
description: To INSANITY and BEYOND!Throughout the challenges of life and parenthood you will experience exciting, rewarding and terrifying ups and downs and twists and turns! At times, you will feel like you are desperately hanging on to your very last shred of sanity for dear life as you are whipped to the brink of insanity and back like a YO YO! The journey isnâ€™t an easy one. However, it can be an AWESOME one if you CHOOSE to strip away all of the negativity that weighs you down, embrace the insanity and keep focusing on the positive, the blessings and the humor in everything along the way! Stripping Away the INSANITY of LIFE & PARENTHOOD is filled with awesome Comic Strip Mama sass, humor, inspiration and comics that will inspire you to live, love, learn and laugh even when you feel like you are losing your mind!
author: Tanya Masse
